name: Eradication
description:
This project that I've been working on is for my sister. In about a month, it's her birthday! Therefore, since I am the best supportive brother, I developed a game out of her characters from her roleplay/art Instagram account, __.hybrids.__ It's a pretty nifty account. I 9/10 recommend it.  Anyway, now talking about the game, it first starts with a visual novel. However, once you get past that(or just hit the "go straight to game" option at the start menu), you will be greeted with a colorful bullet-hell game. Well, it's not that bullet-hell. You could probably destroy those watermelons easily. This is a decent competitive game for family. 

*Update: added more of my sister's drawings, nerfed the firing rate of the enemies and shooter, changed dialogue, and added start menu button on the rules scene.
